label: tanuki
notes: Snakemake workflow in Python for processing RNA sequences

label: splithalfr_original
notes: Mature R-package for data analysis. Has automated tests, function-level documentation and tutorials in R-formats. Developed and maintained by tpronk

label: splithalfr_smp
notes: Version with SMP-style README. Mature R-package for data analysis. Has automated tests, function-level documentation and tutorials in R-formats. Developed and maintained by tpronk

label: AmsterdamUMCdb
notes: Mature database. Has extensive documentation. Developed by Patrick Thoral and adopted by PacMed

label: jsQuestPlus
notes: Mature JavaScript module for data capture. Has manual tests and tutorials. Developed and maintained by kurokida with support of tpronk.

label: psychojs_testing
notes: Defunct JavaScript framework for automated testing. Has an extensive wiki. Developed by tpronk.

label: deeprank2
notes: Python module with an extensive software management plan. Separate dev documentation is README.dev.md

label: SOMEF
notes: Python application with an extensive software management plan.

label: SOCA
notes: Python + webstack application with an extensive software management plan.
